Articles.Content:
Greetings people.

Haven't as yet got KSP 0.22, but i was wondering if Mods such as B9 aerospace and KW rocketry will have an R&D tier. Or will they only be available for sandbox?

thanks,

Toby
Until they are updated, they will only be available in sandbox. I expect it won't be too long before you see them being updated to be included in tech nodes, however.
If not it takes about 5 seconds to add a part to a node on the techtree. KW should be updated soon (post last night by Kyle saying he would have it out soon).
